author: johnh
msg: Added test case for text-before-script gadget input.

This test demonstrates that the Caja-based parser works, whereas Neko does not. This appears to be due to Neko's attempt to form a full HTML doc when parsing a snippet, finding that #text is not a valid child of <head> (and thus discarding it). The Neko test update reflects this by disabling the test.
